name: Flameruby
description: Grab up to 6 friends and blast into the exciting world of Flameruby! Test your wits with dozens of item combinations or just have fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Memory: 5 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 153 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Memory: 5 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 153 MB available space
